features: Level Up the Game: 34 Inch WQHD 21:9 VA 144Hz Ultrawide Curved gaming computer monitor features Freesync Premium and color optimizer settings.
Experience Smooth Gameplay: Catch all the small details with a 1ms MPRT response rate and 144Hz refresh rate.
Built-In Speakers: Free up desk space with built-in speakers that delivers premium audio. The 2.1 channel amplifier's 5W subwoofer delivers a vibrant bass note!
HDRi Optimization: Get ready for a cinematic experience thanks to the HDRi optimization which improves contrast and colors of the image.
Light Tuner: Be in control of the game by selecting your ideal contrast in both bright and dark scenes!
Brightness Intelligence Technology: Optimizes display performance for work and play to protect your vision while providing a stunning image at the same time.
Height Adjustable: Easily customize your workspace to fit what best works for you! Adjust the height of the monitor for optimal comfort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EXtreme Immersion Enjoy the fast 144Hz refresh rate, superior audio, BenQ proprietary image enhancers, and integrated eye care when you game on EX3410R.

Previous page Intensity ever felt You demand gaming intensity. MOBIUZ delivers. Your Virtual Windshield Wrap your field of view in 1000R curvature to get the true behind-the-wheel feel. Visually Stunning HDRi and Racing Mode showcase details in vivid color with crisp clarity. Next page 1 Intensity ever felt 2 Better Immersion 3 See the sights better

What is BenQ HDRi and How Does it Increase Your Immersion? HDRi, BenQ’s proprietary adaptive technology, adjusts your monitor’s display to suit your environment. A built-in sensor detects ambient light levels and simultaneously assesses and adjusts on-screen images. Customized color performance, detail contrast, and image clarity deliver mind-blowing display. This realism makes on-screen display more engaging and immersive. Make HDRi your secret weapon.
Previous page Authentic Audio Make it sound real with 2.1 channel speakers, a 5W subwoofer, and a DSP for selectable audio modes. Sonic Performance Next page 1 Sounds like magic 2 Sonic Performance

Previous page Scenario Mapping Pair each Quick OSD preset with an input. Simply change the input and your settings auto-adjust. Ergonomic Design Set your screen to the height and angle that are most comfortable for you. Next page 1 Scenario Mapping 2 Ergonomic Design

Brightness Intelligence Plus Brightness Intelligence Plus adjusts display brightness and color temperature for your most comfortable viewing experience. The B.I.+ sensor detects screen content and environmental lighting, then adapts the display image accordingly. Headaches, eye strain, and fatigue become a thing of the past. Your dream of a monitor that adapts to its surroundings just came true.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for PC and PS5
reviews.reviewText: Got this monitor to upgrade from my 1080p ultrawide, the monitors picture quality is really vibrant with good colors and brightness.The HDR is actually pretty decent for what it is, and the 3 HDRi modes seem to do a good job as long as your content matches the setting (will also need HDR turned on in windows to make it work properly).Works well with my PS5, it auto detected HDR and had me calibrate it on first boot with the new monitor, it does streach a bit since the ps5 doesn't support ultrawide but its not annoying, after a few minutes you don't really notice.Monitor is Vesa 100 compatible wich is awesome since I don't have massive amounts of desk space and already had a mount ready to go on my desk.Freesync Premium Pro works great with Gsync as well, everything is buttery smooth in action games and racers, have noticed no issues at all with compatibility in the games I've tried.Eye fatigue also seems to be less of an issue as well, I normally wear glasses with blue light filtering when looking at screens but don't seem to need them with this monitor, had a 4 hour gaming session and didn't feel strained at all.If I had the space I would definitely buy a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've only had this this for a little while now but it's absolutely fantastic so far. Can you get other monitors at this price with a good screen yes of course, yet the party trick that brings it out on top is the built in speakers are actually good. Are they Bose or edifier quality? No and if that's what you're looking for you have your wallet and options. Yet these are still fantastic all all on their own and sound "good" as a solid 2.1 much less built into my monitor.The final coupe-de-gras is the fact that it comes with a pretty handy remote which enables me to change volume and input source without having to reach around the few action figures that I have around on my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This display is amazing. Colors are so bright and vibrant. The blacks are gorgeous. The image is buttery smooth. I've been playing Dead Space Remake, Titanfall 2, and Guild Wars 2 and all three games POP on this display. The ports on the back are respectable. I connect to my tower with DisplayPort and use HDMI for a Series S and Switch. Both of the consoles look great too. The Switch is a bit blurry I think but I think I just need to tweak some settings (it's a Switch tho, so...) Definitely worth every dollar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor with a couple of small flaws
reviews.reviewText: Thus monitor has a great picture, great sound, and amazing controls. Lots of really amazing options.One drawback is that any time I run an update on my video card the monitor will change the settings. It's a 5 second fix to change it back, but super annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for casual gaming and productivity
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is perfect for my needs. I wanted a very wide monitor with heavy curve, and this delivers both. Monitor came with one dead pixel but it is in the corner of the monitor and I have never noticed it when doing work. Note that when using HDMI it caps at 100fps, but with displayport it should be 144. If you are a hardcore gamer don't get this, but if you like to play casually and at 100-144 fps, but want a monitor you can still be productive on, this is the one. Speakers are also very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son really love this monitor. He says it’s amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Completely bricked after 1 month
reviews.reviewText: Worked great for a month and then while i was using it it turned off snd lost power. Nothing i do can get it to have power again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great sim racing screen
reviews.reviewText: i got this for my sim rig and have zero regrets. the curve is just right for my use case. i love the ambient lighting correction. i highly recommend
Un monitor de calidad premium, buenos colores, buenas bocinas , funciona genial para ofimática como para gaming

Soy un jugador "casual" no competitivo con un 3060 TI y siento que a veces mi grafica "no da" para jugar Fortnite por ejemplo. A pesar de no usar grafico en Epico.Otra cosa es que si haces Stream y juegas, si hay un poco de problemas por que la captura de la pantalla de 34" 1440p y escalarla a tu pantalla de Stream. y esto es claro hablando estrictamente de mi equipo.No es podido encontrar puntos muertos.El sistema de cambio de entradas si es un poco lento, ya que si parpadea al cambiar y se tarda un poco.El cambio de audio tambien es un poco fastidioso, pero tiene control así que lo hace un poco menos tedioso.Suena bastante bien, tampoco es un sonido espectacular pero si cumple para tenerlo de frente.La luz Led de la parte de atrasará no tiene muchísima iluminación, ha y se maneja desde el sistema que les comento que esta lento, así que pues ahí cada quien. xDTengo que comentar que a mi por lo que mas que intereso fue por la función de poder poner la pantalla divida entre 2 diferentes puertos en modo miniatura. Eso creo que es lo más cool.Saludos.

Entre sus diferentes modos de imagen el mejor con diferencia es el HDRi.Hay otros modelos de otras marcas con mejores especificaciones en el papel e incluso más varatos.Elegí este monitor por 3 razones:1.- el modo HDRi se ve muy muy bien2.- los materiales de construcción son muy buenos y su aspecto en general de ve muy bien. No quise usarlo sin su base.3.- El tener un control es lo máximo. Parece exagerado pero yo que trabajo desde casa es cómodo pasar entre las diferentes entradas de video sin que tener que acercarme al monitor para cambiarlo.

Solo puedo decirte que fue amor a primera vista desde que salió a la venta al mercado. Su luz RGb es grandiosa, su tamaño facilita el espacio de trabajo y la productividad en tu trabajo incrementa, cualquier tarea que tengas que realizar, tendrás el espacio necesario y de sobra para realizar.
Es un buen producto, la barra de sonido se escucha muy bien, la calidad de imagen y el diseño, me encanta
